Details.Name: sc_main_benefit
Details.Feature: Complimentary access to over 600 airport VIP lounges twice a year with Personalised Priority Pass membership card.
2 Citi Miles on every S$1 overseas; 1.2 Citi Miles on every S$1 spent locally. 6 Citi Miles per S$1 spent on Expedia.com; 10 Citi Miles per S$1 on Kaligo.com
Earn 10,000 bonus Citi Miles upon renewal of annual membership.

Details.Name: sc_promotion_cond
Details.Feature: Charge a minimum spend of at least S$500 within 30 days of card approval. Promotion is valid till 31 April 2016.

Details.Name: sc_other_fee
Details.Feature: Air Miles Conversion Fee: S$25 per transaction
Air Miles Conversion Fee: S$25 per transaction
Minimum Repayment: 1% of current a/c balance plus 1% outstanding amount plus late charges or S$50, whichever is higher.

Details.Name: sc_disclosure
Details.Feature: Minimum 2,000 Citi Miles required for cash rebate redemption: 2,000 Citi Miles = S$20 rebate. Thereafter, incremental of 1,000 Citi Miles can be redeemed for each S$10 rebate.

S$25 administration fee will be charged for each redemption. For processing of the redemption request, please allow 5 working days for KrisFlyer, Asia Miles, Executive Club, Infinity MileageLands, Enrich, Garuda Frequent Flyer, HHonors or IHG Rewards and 3 weeks for SkyMiles, Royal Orchid Plus or Etihad Guest.
